title: Ability Points
body:
I have 3 gameplay mechanics I'm curious about.
1.  Does getting items or putting a point in an ability when it is placed, increase its statistics? E.G Shaco's boxes, Heimerdinger's turrets, Caitlyn's traps, nidalee's traps etc.

2. Does adding a point in an ability while it is going off such as Ashe's ult, Fiddles ult etc. , increase the statistics of the ult?

3. When I add a point in an ability while it is on cooldown, does the cooldown decrease (for abilities that reduce the cooldown when adding points into them)?

Thats all I have to ask thx

replies.body:
Yea i'd like to know about question 1. As said, question two is a no.

I'd also like to know, if i fire say a jinx ult, and then buy a new BF and the ult hits a target, does it take my new damage or my old damage?

>I'd also like to know, if i fire say a jinx ult, and then buy a new BF and the ult hits a target, does it take my new damage or my old damage?

New damage.
How do you know? Post a link? Reddit Thread?

I'll try and re-find the link i read it from.

EDIT: this is something i found like 6 months ago, and i'm gonna be in game soon so i will find it just not right now.

I play a fair bit of heimer and shaco in ranked - For them in specific.

1) No and No. Heimer's previously placed turrets don't get increased statistics. Similar with Shaco's boxes; already placed boxes dont get increased statistics.

2) No.

>1. Does getting items or putting a point in an ability when it is placed, increase its statistics? E.G Shaco's boxes, Heimerdinger's turrets, Caitlyn's traps, nidalee's traps etc.

Yes.

>Does adding a point in an ability while it is going off such as Ashe's ult, Fiddles ult etc. , increase the statistics of the ult?

Yes (assuming before it hits for the Ashe Ult etc.).

> Does getting items or putting a point in an ability when it is placed, increase its statistics? E.G Shaco's boxes, Heimerdinger's turrets, Caitlyn's traps, nidalee's traps etc.

Yes (If I'm not mistaken). It might depend on the specific ability though.

> Does adding a point in an ability while it is going off such as Ashe's ult, Fiddles ult etc. , increase the statistics of the ult?

Depending on the ability it *might* increase the stats of the currently active ability. Keyword "might"

> When I add a point in an ability while it is on cooldown, does the cooldown decrease (for abilities that reduce the cooldown when adding points into them)?

No. The cooldown will only be reduced after the next cast as the result of a point being put into the ability, not while it's on cooldown.
